noTasksTracked: No tasks tracked yet. Start a timer to log your work!
dailyOverviewSubtitle: Manage tasks & analyze progress with Manual & Pomodoro timers.
noTasksToday: No tasks tracked yet for today.
exitFocusMode: Click or press ESC to exit
driveStatusConnectedReady: Connected to Drive. Ready for backup/restore.
driveStatusConnectedEnable: Connected to Drive. Enable backup in settings.
driveStatusConnectToEnable: Connect to Google to enable this feature.
driveStatusFailedInit: Failed to initialize Google Drive client.
driveStatusNotConfigured: Google Drive Backup not configured by developer.
driveStatusSignedIn: Successfully signed in to Google Drive.
driveStatusBackupEnabledManual: Drive Backup enabled. Perform a backup or restore manually.
driveStatusBackupEnabledFirstTime: Your data will be backed up to a private folder in your Google Drive. You can manually backup or restore your data. Automatic sync is not yet supported.
driveStatusBackupInProgress: Backing up data to Google Drive...
driveStatusBackupFailedConsole: Backup failed. See console for details.
driveStatusRestoreInProgress: Attempting to restore from Google Drive...
driveStatusRestoreConfirmMessage: Found backup from {timestamp}. Restoring will overwrite your current local data. Are you sure?
driveStatusRestoreNotFound: No backup file found on Google Drive or unable to read it.
driveStatusRestoreFailed: Restore failed. Data might be be corrupt or unreadable. See console.
noProjectsYet: No projects created yet. Add one above to get started!
noDataForReportBody: Start tracking your time or creating projects to see your activity summary here.
moreReportsComingSoonBody: Advanced charts and detailed analytics are coming soon to help you understand your productivity even better!
calendarStatusConnectToEnable: Connect to Google to enable Calendar Sync.
calendarStatusNotConfigured: Google Calendar Sync not configured by developer.
calendarStatusFailedInit: Failed to initialize Google Calendar client.
calendarStatusApiNotReady: Google Calendar API not ready. Try reconnecting.
calendarStatusConnectedEnable: Connected. Enable sync to start adding tasks to Calendar.
calendarStatusReady: 'timekeeper' calendar active. New tasks will be synced.
calendarStatusCreated: 'timekeeper' calendar created successfully. New tasks will be synced.
calendarStatusErrorListing: Error accessing your calendars. Check console.
calendarStatusError: An error occurred with Google Calendar. Check console.
calendarStatusSignInFailed: Google Sign-In failed. Calendar sync unavailable.
calendarEventAdded: Task '{taskName}' added to Google Calendar at {time}.
calendarEventError: Failed to add task '{taskName}' to Google Calendar.
calendarSyncReminder: Please note: Tasks will only be synced to your Google Calendar if Calendar Sync is enabled and the 'timekeeper' calendar is successfully configured.
noEventsAvailable: No special events available at this time. Check back later!
noThemesUnlocked: No additional themes unlocked. Participate in events to discover new ones!
eventDescBatmanUnlock: Log 20 hours of focused work after sunset (6 PM - 6 AM local time) to unlock the 'Gotham Knight' theme.
eventDescIronmanUnlock: Complete 5 projects with an average of 3 Pomodoros per task to unlock the 'Mark Armor' theme.
eventDescAgentSecretUnlock: Complete 10 tasks marked as 'confidential' (in task description) to unlock the 'Secret Agent' theme.
themeUnlockedMessage: Congratulations! You've unlocked the '{themeName}' theme. It has been automatically applied.
